text: manh-eun seongseoui baegseongdeul-eun neo hoega mid-eum-eul gajija bulsinhagileul wonhadoda ineun jinsil-i geudaedeul-ege myeongsidoemae geudeul seuseuloga sigihado da geuleona hananim-ui myeonglyeong-i iss-eul ttaekkaji yongseohago gangwa haljini jin sillo hananim-eun modeun il-e jeonjijeon neunghasinila
